classic rpg you will have to think about how you build your characters  the rule systems are functional for a new player but so deep that a veteran can still research and learn some new tricks  i would recommend reading up on how the armor system works and how wounds work before creating a character  overall the game has a strong main story and enough side quests to keep it interesting  i love what computers have done for rpgs
